en.title: Cat Dental Care: Brushing Teeth and Preventing Periodontal Disease
en.content:
Periodontal disease is extremely common in cats — approximately 80% of cats over 3 years of age are affected by some form of oral disease. Regular dental care is key to prevention.

Do Cats Really Need Their Teeth Brushed?

Yes, dental care is important for cats too. When plaque hardens into tartar, it leads to periodontal disease, which if left untreated can result in tooth loss and even affect internal organs.

How to Brush Your Cat's Teeth

Use a cat-specific toothbrush and toothpaste. Rather than jumping straight to the toothbrush, start by getting your cat used to having their mouth area touched, then progress to wiping teeth with gauze, and finally advance to using a toothbrush.

Alternatives When Brushing Is Difficult

Dental care treats, water additives (dental rinses), and chew toys can serve as supplementary options. However, brushing with a toothbrush remains the most effective method of dental care.

zh.title: 猫咪刷牙与口腔护理：预防牙周病的基础知识
zh.content:
牙周病是猫咪极为常见的疾病，据统计约80%的3岁以上猫咪都有某种形式的口腔问题。日常的口腔护理对预防至关重要。

猫咪需要刷牙吗？

是的，猫咪也需要刷牙。牙菌斑硬化为牙结石后会导致牙周病，放任不管可能造成牙齿脱落甚至影响内脏健康。

刷牙方法

使用猫咪专用的牙刷和牙膏。不要一开始就用牙刷，先让猫咪习惯被触碰嘴部周围，然后用纱布擦拭牙齿，最后再过渡到使用牙刷。

刷牙困难时的替代方案

可以使用洁齿零食、饮水添加型洁牙水以及磨牙玩具作为辅助。不过，使用牙刷清洁仍然是最有效的方法。
